div.pre: 1410 Mektepini, near Sabuncupinar (be- tween anc. Dorylaeum and Cotiaeum), Phrygia, 1956 Burial: c. 190 B.C. Contents: 752+ AR Alexander III: 23 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 17, Myriandrus 1, Sidon 1, Babylon 3, Alexandreia 1) 467 late post. tetradr. (Ar- gos 3, Sicyon 2, Callatis 2, Odessus 3, Mesembria 13, Cabyle 10, unc. Euxine 2, Heracleia Bith. 57, Sinope 7, Assus 4, Mytilene 8, Methymna 2, Myrina 2, Cyme 4, Temnos 2, Pergamum 14, Phocaea 3, Smyrna 2, Clazomenae 1, Erythrae 11, Chios 35, Teos 1, Colo- phon 4, Ephesus 4, Samos 21, Magnesia 12, Miletus 22, Mylasa 1, unc. Caria 5, Cos 1, Cnidus 4, Nisyros 6, Rhodes 63, Phaselis 17, Perge 35, Aspendus 39, Aradus 20, unc. mints 22, eastern imit. 2, barb. imit. 1) Philip III: 1 tetradr. (Salamis) Demetrius Poliorcetes: 1 tetradr. (Pella) Antigonus Gonatas: 8 tetradr. Antigonus Doson: 6 tetradr. Philip V: 7 tetradr. Lysimachus: 10 lifetime tetradr. (Lysi- macheia 1, Amphipolis 1, Pella 1, Perinthus 1, Lampsacus 3, Smyrna 1, Magnesia 2) 102 post. tetradr. (Lysima- cheia 2, Byzantium 38, Calchedon 15, Cius 3, Cyzicus 28, Tenedos 6, unc. Propontis 7, unc. mints 3) Sinope: 1 tetradr. Prusias I: 8 tetradr. Eumenes I: 1 tetradr. Attalus I: 8 tetradr. Eumenes II: 5 tetradr. Alabanda: 2 tetradr. Side: 4 tetradr. Seleucus I: 3 tetradr. (Pergamum 1, Se- leuceia ad Tigrim 1, unc. mint 1) Antiochus I: 8 tetradr. (Tarsus 1, An- tiocheia 1, Seleuceia ad Tigrim 5, unc. mint 1) Antiochus II: 12 tetradr. (Lysimacheia 1, Assus 1, Seleuceia ad Tigrim 7, Susa 2, unc. western 1) Seleucus II: 2 tetradr. (Susa) Antiochus Hierax: 35 tetradr. (Parium 2, Lampsacus 9, Alexandreia Troas 10, Ilium 5, Sardes 2, unc. western 7) Seleucus III: 1 tetradr. (Antiocheia) Antiochus III: 34 tetradr. (Tarsus 2, An- tiocheia 9, Apameia 1, Laodiceia 3, Nisibis 12, Susa 4, Ecbatana 1, unc. mints 2) Unc. king Antiochus: 1 tetradr. Abyath'a, Arabia Felix: 2 tetradr. Disposition: Istanbul 686; Paris some Olçay-Seyrig, Le Trésor de Mektepini en Phrygie (Paris, 1965), illus.
